alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:51PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 415 PM MST... At 350 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florence Junction, or 8 miles southeast of Gold Canyon, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Florence Junction, Kings Ranch, Queen Valley and Gold Camp. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 201 and 217. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 143 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
